post_message: The woman said doused herself with rubbing alcohol before it was ignited by a stove and oven. She said she had turned on the stove and oven the previous day to heat up her apartment, on advice from a neighbor, as part of the effort to kill the bedbugs.
â€œMy heart dropped into my stomach, and I was immediately hysterical," the woman said.
